## Part I

Identify the games that are possible if the bag contained 

* 12 red cubes
* 13 green cubes
* 14 blue cubes

Submit the sum of the ids.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### R


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
getcubes = function(
    x
    , colors = c("red", "green", "blue")
){
  
  vapply(
    colors
    , FUN = \(c){
      v = grep(c, x = x, value = TRUE)
      v = gsub(c, replacement = "", x = v)
      v = trimws(v)
      max(0L, as.integer(v))
    }
    , FUN.VALUE = integer(1L)
  )
  
}  

txt = gsub("^.*?:", "", txt) 

spl = lapply(
  txt
  , FUN = strsplit
  , split = ";|,"
) |> 
  lapply("[[", 1)

cnt = Map(
  getcubes
  , x = spl
)

lapply(
  cnt
  , FUN = \(i){
    all(i <= c(12, 13, 14))
  }
) |> 
  unlist() |> 
  which() |> 
  sum()
```
